nodes.text: Vulk was a male Je'daii Ranger who served the Je'daii Order on Tython at the height of the Infinite Empire's reign. A friend of Je'daii Master Brock and his wife, Vulk died in 25,801 BBY on Kalimahr when his ship was shot down while he was fighting Xang terrorists and when the Ranger crashed his ship into the Southern Ocean of the planet in order to avoid causalities in the nearby city of Rhol Yan.
